text: Mira Furlan (7 September 1955 â€“ 20 January 2021) was a Croatian-American actress and singer. She played Ambassador Delenn on the science fiction television series Babylon 5 and Danielle Rousseau on Lost. Furlan died on 20 January 2021 in Los Angeles, aged 65. The cause of death was problems caused by the West Nile virus. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Zagreb Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Deaths from West Nile virus Category:Croatian movie actors
title: Mira Furlan
